H0.text: Which famous woman in history had a cottage in Shottery in Warwickshire. Anne Hathaway

H1.text: Which famous woman in history had a cottage in Shottery in Warwickshire. Mary Arden

H2.text: Which famous woman in history had a cottage in Shottery in Warwickshire. Elizabeth Gaskell

H3.text: Which famous woman in history had a cottage in Shottery in Warwickshire. Adam Shulman

A4.text: Anne Hathaway is believed to have grown up in Shottery, a village just to the west of Stratford-upon-Avon, Warwickshire, England.

A5.text: It was known as Hewlands Farm in Shakespeare's day and had more than 90 acres (36 hectares) of land attached to it.
